include(Einsums_Message)

# cmake-format: off
set(_einsums_einsums_modules
    assertion
    backtrace
    concepts
    config
    errors
    itt_notify
    preprocessor
    print
    profile
    string_utils
    tensor
    tensor_base
    util
)
# cmake-format: on

einsums_info("")
einsums_info("  Configuring libeinsums_einsums modules:")

foreach(module ${_einsums_einsums_modules})
  add_subdirectory(${module})
endforeach()
